title: The Grudge 2 = Ju-on 2
creator_credit: Takashi Shimizu, Takashige Ichise, Nikkatsu Kabushiki Kaisha and Kadokawa Shoten Publishing Company
brief_description: In this sequel to “The Grudge”, a Tokyo house has been the site of many strange disappearances. A television crew go to investigate the site, setting off a spate of killings by the evil spirit that dwells there. Although not as well received as “The Grudge” this horror film contains a convoluted narrative, but contains exemplary scares and thrills, fitting for the genre, with a chilling finale. Cast includes: Noriko Sakai, Chiharu Niiyama and Kei Horie.
